Definition: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event. For example, a MedicationRequest may require a patient to have laboratory test performed before it is dispensed.

Short: Choice of types representing a plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event. For example, a MedicationRequest may require a patient to have laboratory test performed before it is dispensed.
Definition: Choice of types representing a plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event. For example, a MedicationRequest may require a patient to have laboratory test performed before it is dispensed.

Short: Used to record and send details about a request for referral service or transfer of a patient to the care of another provider or provider organization.
Definition: Used to record and send details about a request for referral service or transfer of a patient to the care of another provider or provider organization.

Short: A request for a procedure to be performed. May be a proposal or an order.
Definition: A request for a procedure to be performed. May be a proposal or an order.

Short: A record of a request for service such as diagnostic investigations, treatments, or operations to be performed.
Definition: A record of a request for service such as diagnostic investigations, treatments, or operations to be performed.

Short: An order for a medication to be dispensed and instructions for use.
Definition:
An order for a medication to be dispensed and instructions for use.
Value sets for status are in direct conflict between DSTU2 Argonaut and STU3 US-Core.
Category does not exist in DSTU2 and is provided as an extension.
Intent was added in STU3 and is provided as an extension with required binding.
